resources.string: Unknown error occurred. Please close the application and open again. If error persists, contact your project coordinator

Karya Participation Consent Form


Thank you for using the Karya platform for completing your classroom homework. As part of the homework, you will be submitting video recordings of yourself signing different sentences. You should have received a consent form for the same from the course coordinators. Please confirm that you have read and agreed to that consent form.


If you have not received the consent form, you can access it at the following link: Course Consent Form


Have you agreed to the consent form shared by your course coordinator
You should have received a 8-digit access code from your teacher. Please enter that access code below.
You have entered an invalid creation code.
To use Karya, you need to register with our application using your phone number. Please enter your phone number below.
We have sent you a 6-digit OTP via SMS. Please enter that OTP below
You have entered an invalid OTP
Please click your profile picture. You can skip this step if you do not want a profile picture
Please enter your year of birth
Your phone number is already registered. Please try with another phone number.
Please transliterate the following word from English to Hindi
